content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 1 **description ** do you like squishy and cozy designs because the new erin cocoon shrug is for you this design is super simple with a fun repeat that is lovely in all colors and easily adaptable to different yarns and comes in 4 sizes from xs - 5x so you can find something that works for you you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos copyright @ divine debris 2020 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/erin-cocoon-shrug-free-crochet-pattern/
